explanation: [0-0] A bald man, wearing a white T-shirt and camouflage pants, walks forward to a workbench with a bottle of beer on it. The background is a white wall with a set of white double doors, white lights on the ceiling, and blue work equipment behind the man.
[0-2] The man picks up the beer with his left hand, turns his body to the left, and places his right hand on the mouth of the bottle. He looks down.

The man tries to open the beer with his right hand, twisting it a few times without success. Then the camera zooms in, the man turns to the right, places the mouth of the bottle on the lower edge of the table, makes a fist with his right hand, raises it and tries to open it. Subsequently, the camera zooms out, and the man stands by the table and looks to the left.
